hero.badge: The AI-Powered Operating System for Roll-Ups
hero.title: Acquire. Integrate. Scale. Repeat.
hero.lead: ServiceTsunami is the unified command center for roll-up operators. Consolidate ERP, finance, HR, compliance, and AI across every portfolio company from day one.
hero.subtext: Stop stitching together spreadsheets and legacy systems after every acquisition. One platform to run your entire roll-up — from M&A pipeline to exit.
hero.subHighlight: The operating system that scales with every acquisition.

governedDataProducts.title: Unified Back Office Across Entities
governedDataProducts.description: Consolidate ERP, finance, banking, and spend management across every portfolio company. One chart of accounts, one source of truth, one dashboard for the entire roll-up.

unifiedLakehouseFabric.title: AI Agents That Know Your Business
unifiedLakehouseFabric.description: Deploy autonomous AI agents for hyper-local ad campaigns, insurance RCM automation, HR compliance, and financial reporting. Agents learn each entity's context and operate 24/7.

agenticAutomation.title: M&A Pipeline to Exit Playbook
agenticAutomation.description: Track deals, run due diligence, model integration plans, and manage exit readiness — all in one place. Purpose-built for operators running 5 to 500 entities.

items.label: ERP & Finance
items.description: Consolidate general ledger, AP/AR, payroll, and banking across every acquisition. Eliminate duplicate systems, reduce headcount overhead, and close books in days instead of weeks.

items.label: AI-Powered Ads
items.description: Deploy AI-driven ad campaigns tailored to each entity's local market. Automatically optimize creative, targeting, and budget allocation across hundreds of locations.

items.label: Compliance & HR
items.description: Onboard new acquisitions to unified HR policies, benefits, and compliance frameworks instantly. Automate state-by-state regulatory tracking and reduce integration timelines by 80%.

features.heading: Every Module a Roll-Up Needs
features.subtitle: From deal sourcing to exit — one platform, zero integration headaches.

connectEverySource.title: M&A Pipeline & Due Diligence
connectEverySource.description: Track acquisition targets, manage LOIs, run automated due diligence checklists, and model post-close integration plans. Never lose a deal to disorganization again.

semanticControlPlane.title: Banking & Spend Management
semanticControlPlane.description: Centralized treasury, entity-level banking, automated expense policies, and real-time spend visibility. Control cash flow across your entire portfolio from one dashboard.

agentAutomationStudio.title: Insurance & RCM Automation
agentAutomationStudio.description: Automate revenue cycle management, claims processing, and insurance workflows with AI agents. Reduce denial rates, accelerate collections, and eliminate manual follow-ups.

lakehouse.heading: Built for Operators Who Move Fast
lakehouse.description: Roll-ups fail when integration stalls. ServiceTsunami ensures every acquisition is operational from day one.

unifiedGovernance.title: The Integration Problem
unifiedGovernance.description: Most roll-ups spend 12-18 months integrating each acquisition onto legacy systems. ServiceTsunami cuts that to weeks with pre-built playbooks and AI-powered automation.

programmablePipelines.title: The Visibility Problem
programmablePipelines.description: Operating 50+ entities on different systems means no one has the full picture. Our unified platform gives you real-time P&L, cash flow, and KPIs across every entity.

compliantCollaboration.title: The Scale Problem
compliantCollaboration.description: Adding headcount for every acquisition kills your margins. AI agents handle routine finance, HR, and compliance tasks so you can scale entities without scaling overhead.

adaptiveGuardrails.title: Faster Integration
adaptiveGuardrails.description: Reduce post-acquisition integration from months to weeks. Pre-built playbooks for ERP migration, HR onboarding, and financial consolidation.

explainableDecisions.title: Lower Overhead
explainableDecisions.description: AI agents replace manual processes across finance, HR, and compliance. Scale from 10 to 100 entities without proportional headcount growth.

lakehouseSignals.title: Exit Readiness
lakehouseSignals.description: Clean financials, unified systems, and auditable data from day one. When it's time to exit, your house is already in order.

dataIntegrationLayer.title: Data & Integration Layer
dataIntegrationLayer.description: Connect ERPs, banks, payroll systems, and CRMs. Ingest data from every entity into a unified data lake with automated reconciliation.

semanticGovernanceLayer.title: Orchestration Layer
semanticGovernanceLayer.description: Temporal-powered workflows handle cross-entity processes: financial consolidation, compliance checks, M&A integration playbooks, and scheduled reporting.

agenticExecutionLayer.title: AI Agent Layer
agenticExecutionLayer.description: Autonomous agents for ad optimization, RCM automation, financial analysis, HR compliance, and more. Each agent understands entity-level context and operates continuously.

ai.heading: AI Agents for Every Function
ai.description: Deploy specialized agents across your roll-up.

insightCopilots.title: Financial Intelligence Agents
insightCopilots.description: Consolidate P&L across entities, flag anomalies, forecast cash flow, and generate board-ready reports. Like having a CFO team that never sleeps.

composableSkills.title: Operations & Compliance Agents
composableSkills.description: Monitor regulatory changes, automate compliance filings, manage HR onboarding, and track insurance claims. Reduce risk while scaling faster.

closedLoopActuators.title: Growth & Revenue Agents
closedLoopActuators.description: Run hyper-local ad campaigns, optimize pricing, manage customer acquisition, and automate revenue cycle management across every entity.

marketplaceConnectors.title: Private Credit & Lending

adaptiveGovernanceAi.title: Exit & Liquidity Hub
adaptiveGovernanceAi.description: Automated sell-side prep, data room generation, quality of earnings support, and buyer management. Be exit-ready at all times.

autonomousFinopsSuites.title: Industry-Specific Playbooks
autonomousFinopsSuites.description: Pre-built integration templates for healthcare, home services, professional services, and other high-frequency roll-up verticals.
